pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: その費用は彼が負担すべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: The expense is chargeable on him.

lessons.japanese: その責任は彼には負担だ。
lessons.indonesian: That responsibility is a burden to him.

lessons.japanese: その仕事は私の健康にとって負担だ。
lessons.indonesian: The work is a heavy tax on my health.

lessons.japanese: ガソリンはこちらの負担ですか。
lessons.indonesian: Should I pay for the gas?

lessons.japanese: 両親にこれ以上負担をかけたくない。
lessons.indonesian: I don't want to be any more burden to my parents.

lessons.japanese: 費用は彼の負担になるだろう。
lessons.indonesian: The expense will fall on him.

lessons.japanese: 彼女は自分の負担で本を出版した。
lessons.indonesian: She published the book at her own expense.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の親切に感謝する一方負担にも感じる。
lessons.indonesian: I appreciated her kindness, while I feel it burdensome.

lessons.japanese: 彼は家計の上で彼女の負担にはなっていなかった。
lessons.indonesian: He was not a financial burden on her.

lessons.japanese: 彼は、両親の負担になった。
lessons.indonesian: He was a burden to his parents.

lessons.japanese: 彼の負担を軽くしてやった。
lessons.indonesian: I relieved him of his burden.

lessons.japanese: 大家族を養って行く負担が徐々に彼を追いつめてきた。
lessons.indonesian: The pressures of supporting a big family are beginning to catch up with him.

lessons.japanese: 接待費はうちのグループが負担させられた。
lessons.indonesian: The entertainment expense was borne by our group.
